text: VasiliaGorochov (1988) In Medvedev, LN & Striganova [Ed.] Fauna i ekologiya nasekomykh Vetnama [The fauna and ecology of insects of Vietnam] 11 is an Asian genus of crickets in the tribe Landrevini. This genus appears to be monotypic, with the single species Vasilia vietnamensis (Gorochov, 1988). ==References== Category:Crickets
title: Vasilia
